text: Cuenca (full name Santa Ana de los cuatro r√≠os de Cuenca) is the capital of the Azuay Province. It is located in the highlands of Ecuador at about 2500 m above sea level. The center of the city is listed as a UNESCO World Heritage Trust site because of its many historical buildings. Category:Cities in Ecuador Category:Capitals of Ecuadorian provinces Category:Azuay Province
title: Cuenca, Ecuador
